name: Naval Battle
description:
This is a recreation of the popular BattleShips board game. In this game you play against the computer to destroy each other's ships.

The game was part of one of my university assignments and it was made in less than a week before deadline just like all university assignments. If you would like to read the report that was made from this assignment you can read it here.

The source code is available on GitHub.

Thanks for playing!
